text:
In case of destruction, loss or inordinate delays in cargo carriage, the liability amount has been raised from Rs. 1,581 to Rs. 1,767.

For destruction, loss, damage or delay of baggage, the domestic airlines will have to pay Rs. 1.05 lakh, up from the present Rs. 93,000.

This will be in line with the Montreal Convention, which was acceded to by India in May 2009.

The International Civil Aviation Organisation will increase the liability limit once in five years.
title: Higher compensation for fliers
